Posts.Content: Enza wrote: I am scheduled to have one tomorrow and Im terrified.  Firstly I am terrified to have it done, then I will worry after about the results, first getting through.. Please help me ladies, tell me all I will need to know.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MRI Guided Biopsy Enza jushavinfun

Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2013 01:50PM Enza wrote: Thank you ladies, I will try and remember all your words tomorrow.  I think I am most afraid of the MRI.  I had one 2 weeks ago, hence they found this now that has to be biopsied.  The MRI is too closed in for me, even though Im laying on my belly.  I am glad to hear that I won't feel any pain too.
